scripts.import-pgn: npx tsc --outDir ./.tmp_scripts --module commonjs --target ES2019 --esModuleInterop true ./scripts/importPgnToLevel1.ts ./src/utils/pgnConverter.ts && node ./.tmp_scripts/scripts/importPgnToLevel1.js && npm run cleanup-tmp
scripts.autofill-pgn: npx tsc --outDir ./.tmp_scripts --module commonjs --target ES2019 --esModuleInterop true ./scripts/autofillSolutionsFromPgn.ts && node ./.tmp_scripts/autofillSolutionsFromPgn.js && npm run cleanup-tmp
scripts.populate-opponent-moves: npx tsc --outDir ./.tmp_scripts --module commonjs --target ES2019 --esModuleInterop true ./scripts/populateOpponentMoves.ts ./src/utils/pgnConverter.ts && node ./.tmp_scripts/scripts/populateOpponentMoves.js && npm run cleanup-tmp
scripts.fix-fens: npx tsc --outDir ./.tmp_scripts --module commonjs --target ES2019 --esModuleInterop true ./scripts/fixLevel1Fens.ts ./src/utils/pgnConverter.ts && node ./.tmp_scripts/scripts/fixLevel1Fens.js && npm run cleanup-tmp
